mapper.sql: select member_id, id, name, email, cell_phone, registered_date
mapper.insert: insert into members( id, password, name, cell_phone, tel, email, postal_code, default_address, detail_address, question, answer, registered_date) values( #{id}, password(#{password}), #{name}, #{cellPhone}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{postalCode}, #{defaultAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{question}, #{answer}, curdate())
mapper.select: select id from members where id=#{id}
select email from members where email=#{email}
select cell_phone from members where cell_phone=#{cellPhone}
select * from members where id=#{id} and password=password(#{password})
mapper.update: update members set authkey=#{authkey} where id=#{id}
update members set password_authkey=#{passwordAuthkey} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: from members where id=#{id} and password_authkey=#{passwordAuthkey}
mapper.update: update members set password=password(#{password}), password_authkey='COMPLETE' where id=#{id} and password_authkey=#{passwordAuthkey}
mapper.select: select member_id, name, id, postal_code, default_address, detail_address, cell_phone, nickname from members where member_no=#{member_no}
